alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:05PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ashtabula, southwestern Erie and northwestern Crawford Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Andover, or 15 miles south of Conneaut, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Edinboro, Cambridge Springs, Albion, Andover, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Pymatuning North, Guys Mills, Pymatuning Central, Pierpont, Saegertown, Cherry Valley, Conneautville, Cranesville, Springboro, McKean, Blooming Valley, Venango and Woodcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
